about_the_game:
The Marines have landed! Explore new warfare capabilities in Arma 3 with the Expeditionary Forces Creator DLC. Prepare your Marines for action on the Amphibious Warfare Ship, assault enemy shores with AAV-9 Mack IFVs and Combat Boats, bring supplies ashore with the LCC-1 Landing Craft, perform raids behind enemy lines with new Hunter reconnaissance vehicles, and take part in the invasion of Altis from a new perspective.

HOW TO LAUNCH


Arma 3 Creator DLC: Expeditionary Forces is optional to install and load. To play Arma 3 with this DLC enabled, please visit the DLC section in the Arma 3 Launcher, make sure Expeditionary Forces is owned and loaded, then launch the game by clicking the PLAY button.

DISCLAIMER
This PC game is a work of fiction. Neither the United States Marine Corps nor any other component of the Department of Defense has approved, endorsed, or authorized this product.

KEY FEATURES


AAV-9 Mack
The AAV-9 Mack is an amphibious Infantry Fighting Vehicle capable of ferrying a squad of 13 Marines from ship to shore at high speed. It is equipped with either a 30mm or 50mm autocannon and a 7.62mm coaxial machine gun. It features an extendable periscope for the commander and hatches in the back to allow troops to turn out and return fire.

Combat Boat
The Combat Boat is a 17 meter long multi-role vessel. Its high speed, combined with a versatile design, makes it suitable for amphibious assaults, maritime patrol, and fire support. It can carry a squad of 16 troops plus crew, and can be fitted with a variety of weapons.

LCC-1 Landing Craft
The LCC-1 is a landing craft used to ferry equipment and vehicles from ship to shore. Its design allows it to change between a slow-speed shallow draft ship and a high-speed catamaran. It has a maximum payload of 200 tons and is capable of reaching speeds up to 35 knots (or 65 kph).

Amphibious Warfare Ship “USS Takmyr” (LPD-36)
The Amphibious Warfare Ship is the core of Marine Expeditionary Units. Acting as a floating barracks, it allows MJTFs to deploy all the assets required to sustain operations abroad. Named after the Takistani capital following one of Operation Arrowhead’s fiercest battles, the LPD-36 USS Takmyr is the ship assigned to carry the 29th MEU to Altis and execute Operation Resolute Cyclone.

Its design features a flight deck with hangar for launching helicopters, and a well deck to launch landing crafts or amphibious assault vehicles.

One New Faction
The Marine Joint Task Force has arrived. It is a self-contained expeditionary unit capable of operating independently from amphibious warfare ships and specialized in fighting in littoral areas. It comes with a variety of new equipment, including helmets, vests, uniforms, night vision devices, and scuba diving gear.

Hunter Reconnaissance Vehicles
Taking advantage of the capable MRAP chassis, the Hunter Reconnaissance Vehicles greatly expand on their firepower and sensors. Three new variants are available: Fire Support Vehicle (featuring a 30mm rapid-fire autocannon and Titan missiles), Anti-Tank (featuring a dual Titan-NLOS launcher and 7.62mm coaxial machine gun), and Low Altitude Air Defense (featuring a 30mm rapid fire autocannon, SAAMI missiles, and short-range radar for drone detection).

AH-99J Python
At the request of the Marines, an upgrade for the AH-99 was developed in the late 2010s. Named AH-99J Python, the helicopter trades some of its stealth capabilities for long-range datalink antennas, more powerful radar, and external stores allowing it to carry a wider array of weapons, including AGM-122M Sidearm anti-radiation missiles and Titan NLOS pods.

Resolute Cyclone SP Mini-Campaign
On the eve of the NATO invasion on Altis, Marines from the 29th MEU are tasked with securing the western part of the island. Join the MJTF in this single player mini-campaign, use stealth to infiltrate enemy territory, cut the enemy off from reinforcements, and liberate Kavala from the AAF.

Rope In Hand MP CO-OP
A platoon from Light Armor Reconnaissance is tasked with clearing the road for the Marines who are rapidly advancing towards Athira. Hop in a Hunter FSV or Hunter AT with your friends in this multiplayer co-op scenario and strike deep into enemy territory.

New Features

  • Airburst Munitions: The Hunter LAAD's autocannon is loaded with Airburst munitions which, when combined with radar targeting information, can easily destroy fast aircraft or small drones with just a few shots.
  • Enhanced Drone Detection: The Hunter LAAD features radar that trades detection range for higher sensitivity, enabling it to even detect small quadcopter drones up to a distance of 4 kms.
  • Titan NLOS: Long-range anti-tank missile that requires a datalink to gather targeting information, and can engage both laser and vehicle targets. Using ground following radar, it can fly past terrain obstacles and engage targets with no line of sight at launch up to 32 kms away.
  • AGM-122M Sidearm: The AGM-122M Sidearm was developed as a cheap alternative to more expensive and sophisticated AGM-88C HARM anti-radiation missiles. Converted from stocks of Falchion-22 short range air-to-air missiles, the Sidearm takes advantage of already existing mounts to give most western-made aircraft basic SEAD/DEAD capabilities.

COMPATIBILITY DATA FOR NON-OWNERS


People who do not own the Expeditionary Forces DLC are able to download and install the DLC's optional data via the Arma 3 Steam Workshop.

Subscribing to this Workshop item makes it possible for potential buyers to try out many of the DLC's assets prior to purchasing. It also enables non-owners to join multiplayer servers that make use of DLC content. Be aware that access to the DLC's mini-campaign remains exclusive to owners of the DLC. Restrictions to the use of non-owned content also apply.

ABOUT THE DEVELOPERS


This DLC is published by Bohemia Interactive and developed by Tiny Gecko Studios - a small group of Arma modders and developers with more than a decade of experience across various well-established projects and Creator DLCs.
detailed_description:
ARMA 3 CREATOR DLC


Purchase this DLC to support a talented third-party developer and enjoy some of their best work yet. The Arma 3 Creator DLC program enables selected outside developers to publish original new content for Arma 3 as commercial DLC on Steam. The proceeds of Arma 3 Creator DLC: Expeditionary Forces are shared between Tiny Gecko Studios (developer), Bohemia Interactive (publisher), and Valve (digital distributor).


About the Game

The Marines have landed! Explore new warfare capabilities in Arma 3 with the Expeditionary Forces Creator DLC. Prepare your Marines for action on the Amphibious Warfare Ship, assault enemy shores with AAV-9 Mack IFVs and Combat Boats, bring supplies ashore with the LCC-1 Landing Craft, perform raids behind enemy lines with new Hunter reconnaissance vehicles, and take part in the invasion of Altis from a new perspective.

legal_notice: Arma 3 supports the BattlEye anti-cheat engine. Most server admins choose to enable it on their servers, so please refrain from cheats and hacks or you may receive a global ban. BattlEye global bans are shared with DayZ and Arma 2: Operation Arrowhead.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS Big Sur 11
  • Processor: Apple M1 or 2-core Intel Core i5 1.4 GHz or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5000 or better
  • GPU Memory: 1 GB
  • Hard Drive: 45 GB
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS Big Sur 11
  • Processor: Apple M2 or 6-core Intel Core i5 3.7 GHz or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon Pro 580X or better
  • GPU Memory: 2 GB
  • Hard Drive: 130 GB

name: Arma 3 Creator DLC: Expeditionary Forces

package_groups.name: default

subs.option_text: Arma 3 Creator DLC: Expeditionary Forces - $7.99 USD

package_groups.title: Buy Arma 3 Creator DLC: Expeditionary Forces

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2.4 GHz or AMD Dual-Core Athlon 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 9800GT / AMD Radeon HD 5670 / Intel HD Graphics 4000 with 512 MB VRAM
  • DirectX®: 10
  • Hard Drive: 45 GB free space
  • Audio: DirectX®-compatible on-board
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4460 or AMD FX 4300 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 / AMD Radeon HD 7800 Series with 2 GB VRAM
  • DirectX®: 11
  • Hard Drive: 70 GB free space, SSD / Hybrid HDD / SSHD storage
  • Sound: DirectX®-compatible soundcard

short_description: The Marines have landed! Lead the Marine Joint Task Force in amphibious warfare, utilizing advanced vehicles, gear, and weapons. Engage in a single-player campaign or team up in co-op missions, fight enemy forces across land, sea, and air in intense, strategic battles.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
